To run install elixir (apt-get install elixir)
```
cd ex/
mix deps.get
iex -S mix

> {m,l} = ETX.go()
> ETX.test(m,l)
```

We also pocced the nomad hack.

Last 11600 transactions on the nomad bridge into 2 categories
0 11524 normal TX (10% testset)
1 76 malicious TX (10% testset)

The nomad bridge has its own serialization for its internal _message structure.
<<4::origin, 32::sender, 4::nonce, 4::dest, 32::receipt, tokenId::36, action::rest>> = _message

We got lazy and skipped this part, we plugged in the raw input data! The results puzzled us...

This is a good input 


This is a malicious input 


Training for 1 epoch we got 52% accuracy
Training for 8 epoch we got 100% accuracy

We used a CNN with Cosine Similarity for labeling, training a model per label. We had 2 labels (normal | malicious).
